fields.title: We are a software consultancy specialising in designing, building and supporting IT solutions of all shapes and sizes.
fields.subtitle: Example subtitle here

content.value: With over 20 years in supporting some of the biggest names in healthcare, we have, and continue to build software to help these organisations deliver better healthcare to their customers. Come and see some of our work.

We work on all aspects of Shopify! whether you require a simple touch up to your existing website design, a new feature to improve your work experience or to integrate your data in Shopify with your own internal systems, we have a wealth of experience in these areas.

fields.navigationDescription: A partnership of over 10 years in delivering the services that make up the online doctor platform. Our long standing relationship with LloydsPharmacy continues to grow as we support them in delivering solutions to help make their pharmacy services accessible to all.

content.value: To safely manage and prioritise high volumes of patients so they can be consistently and accurately diagnosed and prescribed treatment when appropriate.
The doctors workflow was analysed to identify where time is spent when reviewing, diagnosing and prescribing each patients requests for treatment.

fields.navigationDescription: Our own application to handle your companies appointment offerings. Our easy to use administrative interface allows you to create your appointment types and availability, assign questionnaires for customers to complete if required and view your upcoming schedule and much more.

fields.title: Appointment booking
fields.subtitle: Create and manage your appointment offerings in one place.

content.value: An appointment booking platform that allows you to create and maintain any type of appointment based offering you provide. Whether you are a pharmacy that offers health related services, a hair dressers, beauty salon, our platform allows you to manage it all with ease.

fields.title: Feels like a native part of your website or app
fields.description:
We have designed our appointment booking application to work with any type of website or app that your business offers. Not only that, we can style the user interfaces to match your brand so that our platform feels like your own.

No website? No problem. It can also run as a standalone service without the need of a website or app integration.

fields.title: See how your day looks
fields.description: Get a clear oversight of the day ahead and the days to come. A fully adjustable table of all your upcoming appointments where you can filter and search to find the information you need.

fields.title: Questionnaire builder
fields.description: When you require information from a customer prior to an appointment, why not get them to provide it to you when they are making the booking? Create questionnaires for your customers to fill out when they book so when they arrive you can get started straight away. Our questionnaire builder can not only help you gather the information you need for a particular appointment, but it can also help guide a customer into choosing the right appointment for them. Customise the flow of the questionnaire based on how questions are answered to make sure you both get the data you need.

fields.navigationDescription: Migrating their online store onto Shopify and supporting with the redesign.

fields.title: John Bell & Croyden
fields.subtitle: A website redesign to match its prestigious history

content.value: To rebuild their website onto a new platform that would support and further enhance John Bell & Croyden's online presence. We were invited up to their pharmacy in London and given a tour to discuss what was important to them and learn about the history of their icon location. We were then able to start developing a solution that reflected their premium brand.

We explored a number of different e-commerce platforms and decided that Shopify was the best fit for this project. The team at John Bell & Croyden provided the designs and what features they would like to have and our developers made a start on bringing them to life.
for yourself! A stylish, modern design built on a platform to support them into the future.
Even though the Shopify platform provides the majority of the functionality out of the box, we were able to get our hands dirty and build in some features ourselves.
Integration of Google Tag Manager to send event information
Integration of Algolia to power the websites search
Bespoke Shopify theme sections for content editors to shape all pages to their liking
Logic to calculate price per unit on items

fields.title: Powerful search integration
fields.description: Algolia is the power behind John Bell & Croyden's performant search functionality. We integrated the software and restyled the components to match the designs of the new website.

fields.title: 20 years of experience building and maintaining IT solutions.
fields.description: We've worked across many different technologies in that time. Whether it is a bespoke solution or an off the shelf product, we have the skills and expertise to help bring your projects to life.  We've worked on projects of all shapes and sizes and can provide the right people for the job.

fields.title: Complex Shopify integrations.
fields.description: Over the last 5 years we’ve been implementing complex integrations with Shopify. Like building a completely custom app that lets legacy fulfilment centres communicate with Shopify orders so fulfilment logistics can operate as normal while the customer facing website can be  replatformed on to Shopify.

fields.title: Software engineering
fields.description: Our team of developers are here to help you create the tools necessary for your business.

fields.title: System design
fields.description: Building and integrating with existing systems is what we do best! Designing a solution to fit your needs is our bread and butter.

fields.title: Web development
fields.description: From a single page site to a complex system that powers many different pages or services that you may offer, we have done it all.

fields.title: Software maintenance
fields.description: Even old systems require a little TLC. We will be more than happy to provide you with support in maintaining any existing systems that you may have.

fields.title: User interface design
fields.description: Seeing is believing. Our designer is here to help visualise your next project.

fields.title: Infrastructure
fields.description: Whether your plans are to move to the cloud or continue with on premise hosting, then look no further. We already support clients with both of these requirements so let us help you too.

fields.title: Consultancy
fields.description: Not sure where to start or looking to take an idea to the next level? Give us a shout and we can offer advice on what to do next.

fields.title: More
fields.description: Even if you cannot find what you're looking for, we're here to help. Get in touch!
